title: 12  Sonia Delaunay-Terk, Signal (Tablecloth), designed 1920, manufactured 1977
publication_title: The Modern Series at the Art Institute of Chicago
content:
<section class="osci-tk-epub-section tombstone" id="tombstone">12  
Designed by Sonia Delaunay-Terk (French, born Ukraine, 1885–1979)  
Made by Artcurial (Paris, France)  
Signal (Tablecloth)  
Designed 1920, manufactured 1977  
Cotton, plain weave; screen-printed; 143.3 × 142.3 cm (56 7/16 × 56 in.)  
Textile Collection Fund, 1978.22

</section><section id="figures">Sonia Delaunay-Terk, Signal (Tablecloth), designed 1920, manufactured 1977.

</section>
